quote: We would never tell someone with a broken leg that they should stop wallowing and get it together. We shouldn’t treat mental health conditions any differently.
author: Lady Gaga

quote: Sadly, too often, the stigma around mental health prevents people who need help from seeking it.
author: Prince William

quote: It’s okay to not be okay. Reaching out for help is a sign of strength.
author: Michael Phelps

quote: You don’t have to struggle in silence. You can be un-silent.
author: Demi Lovato

quote: Self-care is how you take your power back.
author: Lalah Delia

quote: Healing takes time, and asking for help is a courageous step.
author: Mariska Hargitay

quote: Your present circumstances don’t determine where you go; they merely determine where you start.
author: Nido Qubein

quote: The unexamined life is not worth living.
author: Socrates

quote: Being able to be your true self is one of the strongest components of good mental health.
author: Dr. Lauren Fogel Mersy

quote: You are not your illness. You have an individual story to tell.
author: Ruby Wax

quote: Mental health is not a destination, but a process.
author: Noam Shpancer, PhD

quote: I keep moving ahead, as always, knowing deep down inside that I am a good person and that I am worthy.
author: Selena Gomez

quote: Sometimes the people around you won’t understand your journey. They don’t need to, it’s not for them.
author: Jordyn Woods

quote: The advice I’d give to somebody is to keep your mouth shut and your ears open.
author: Tom Brady

quote: You don’t have to be positive all the time. It’s perfectly okay to feel sad, angry, annoyed, frustrated, scared.
author: Lori Deschene

quote: What mental health needs is more sunlight, more candor, and more unashamed conversation.
author: Glenn Close

quote: I found that with depression, one of the most important things you can realize is that you’re not alone.
author: Dwayne Johnson

quote: It’s okay to feel unstable. It’s okay to disassociate. It’s okay to hide from the world.
author: Billie Eilish

quote: Your illness does not define you. Your strength and courage does.
author: Michelle Obama

quote: Healing is not linear.
author: Dr. Thema Bryant
